song_lyrics: Sā re ga ma pa pa, sā re ga ma pa pa,
Pa dha pa ga ma pa ma re, ga ma ga re sā.
Gīt navu gunjāvo, sargam navī banāvo,
Gīt navu, sangīt navu, sargam navī banāvo.
Sā re ga ma pa pa, sā re ga ma pa pa,
Pa dha pa ga ma pa ma re, ga ma ga re sā.
Sā re ga ma pa pa, Sā re ga ma pa pa,
Pa dha pa ga ma pa ma re, ga ma ga re sā.
Sā re ga ma pa pa, Sā re ga ma pa pa,
Pa dha pa ga ma pa ma re, ga ma ga re sā.
title: Gīt navu gunjāvo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-2017: Sadhu Priyadarshandas

Category: Bal Kirtan
